Package com.atakmap.android.util

Class AttachmentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.util.AttachmentManager
  • public class AttachmentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for tracking number of attachments on a given map item Also contains several convenience methods for item attachments

    • Field Summary

      AttachmentManager​(MapView mapView, android.widget.ImageButton attachmentsButton)
      Given a map item and an attachment button, track the number of attachments.

        Find all items with attachments

      • getAttachments

        public static java.util.List<java.io.File> getAttachments​(java.lang.String uid)
        Get list of files attached to a given map item
        Parameters:
        uid - map item UID
        Returns:
        list of file attachments which can be manipulated

      • notifyAttachmentChange

        public static void notifyAttachmentChange​(java.lang.String uid)
        When changing the attachments associated with a map item, it is important to notify that the attachments have changed for a specific map item.
        Parameters:
        uid - the uid for the map item where an attachment has changed.

      • getNumberOfAttachments

        public static int getNumberOfAttachments​(java.lang.String uid)
        Get the number of files attached to a given map item
        Parameters:
        uid - Map item UID
        Returns:
        Number of file attachments

      • addAttachment

        public static java.io.File addAttachment​(MapItem mi,
                                         java.io.File f)
        Convenience method for adding an attachment to to a map item. The attachment is going to be copied into the attachment folder. No effort is made to remove the attachment from the original location.
        Parameters:
        mi - the map item to attach a file to.
        f - the attachment to attach to the map item.
        Returns:
        File the file was attached correctly.

      • getFolderPath

        public static java.lang.String getFolderPath​(java.lang.String uid,
                                             boolean createDir)
        Method for getting the folder path related to attachments. The return value will be the folder that contains all attachments for a marker.
        Parameters:
        uid - the map item uid used to generate the folder path.
        createDir - automatically create the directory if it does not exist.
        Returns:
        a string that is the folder path.

      • getFolderPath

        public static java.lang.String getFolderPath​(java.lang.String uid)
        Method for getting the folder path related to attachments. The return value will be the folder that contains all attachments for a marker. If the folder does not exist it will be created
        Parameters:
        uid - the map item uid used to generate the folder path.
        Returns:
        a string that is the folder path.

      • sendWithAttachmentsNoPrompt

        public static void sendWithAttachmentsNoPrompt​(MapItem mi,
                                               java.lang.String onReceiveAction)
        Convenience method for sending a marker with all attachments unconditionally.
        Parameters:
        mi - the map item.
        onReceiveAction - intent that is fired when the item is sent. Listen for this if you want to be notified that it has been sent.

      • viewItem

        public static void viewItem​(MapView mapView,
                            MapItem mapItem,
                            java.io.File file)
        View a given item attachment
        Parameters:
        mapView - Map view instance
        mapItem - Attachment map item
        file - Attachment file
